id-55904.title: Advertising Agency
id-55904.post-content:
Want to be the next big thing in advertising? Get your creative juices flowing with our Advertising Agency template. With its clean layout and creatively designed template, this agency website template will help you stand out from the crowd. 

You’ll also be able to include a variety of services for your potential clients, along with case studies that will help them understand the process of working with you.

Key features of the Advertising Agency template

  • Beautifully designed website template to showcase the creative side of your business
  • A fully integrated template that promotes all the services you offer, case studies, customer reviews, and more
  • Add photos of your team members on the about page
  • A fully functional contact form that has Google maps integrated
  • Dedicated page to highlight your completed projects and case studies
id-55904.post-excerpt: A well-planned and professional layout that allows you to showcase your agency services

id-49268.title: Martial Arts School
id-49268.post-content:
The Martial Arts School template is a professional and elegant design that allows you to showcase your martial arts school. It features a spacious homepage with an elegantly designed layout to allow for large photos and videos.

The template is perfect for promoting the various martial arts courses, the instructors, student reviews, and more. A CTA is well integrated into the menu to help prospective students quickly start the programs.

Key features of the Martial Arts School template

  • Creatively designed layout that’s perfect for a martial arts school website
  • Impressive use of colors, fonts, and images
  • Well-designed and planned out layouts for each of the pages, such as about, programs, testimonials, and contact
  • Showcase an introductory video of the martial arts school on the about page
  • Fully responsive design that looks great across all devices
id-49268.post-excerpt: Perfect template for a martial arts school and showcasing courses, instructors, and more

id-49809.title: Learn Digital Marketing
id-49809.post-content:
Want to build a platform and offer courses online? Our Learn Digital Marketing template is an elegant and minimalistic design that’ll help showcase your courses on digital marketing. The template promotes you, the expert, within a significant hero section. 

An ‘enroll today’ CTA button integrated into the menu allows potential students to immediately sign up for your courses. The well-integrated newsletter subscription form lets you build a list and send tips and tricks to your students.

Key features of the Learn Digital Marketing template

  • Build an online platform to offer courses in digital marketing, using our engaging and minimalistic website template
  • Well integrated with popular LMS plugins, such as LearnDash, to create, manage, and offer courses online
  • Offer additional resources, such as ebooks, and case studies on a specifically designed page
  • Fully functional contact form that allows prospective students to get in touch with you
  • A customizable and flexible template that can be tweaked to suit your needs
id-49809.post-excerpt: An ideal website template to offer courses and resources on digital marketing

id-49241.title: Catering & Events
id-49241.post-content:
Have you been looking for a website template that is both easy to use and provides an organized, professional image? Our Catering & Events template is the answer! It comes in various colors to help you stand out from competitors.

Whether corporate events or birthday parties, go ahead and promote your various services and menus on your website. Additionally, include testimonials from your clients to show how happy they are with your services.

Key features of the Catering & Events template

  • A creatively designed template that uses vibrant colors
  • All templates are well planned out and easy to use
  • Showcase the catering services for various events and menus as well
  • Include client testimonials on the homepage
  • Fully responsive and customizable design
id-49241.post-excerpt: A perfectly designed template for building a catering and events-related business website

id-49260.title: Music School
id-49260.post-content:
The Music School Template is an easy-to-use website template that can be customized to sell musical instruments, offer music lessons, and showcase your school's campus. Use it as a starting point for your website by adding your content and photos of the music teachers.

The template is not only designed for musicians but also offers a great option for people who want to learn how to play an instrument.

Key features of the Music School template

  • Build a music school website using our inspiring Music School template
  • Accept online applications of prospective students
  • A fully compatible template that allows you to offer and manage online courses
  • Sell musical instruments online using a WooCommerce-ready template
  • Customizable and page-ready template
id-49260.post-excerpt: Perfect template for any aspiring musician to offer courses and sell musical instruments

id-51520.title: Aquarium
id-51520.post-content:
The Aquarium is an awe-inspiring, beautifully crafted website template perfect for promoting an aquarium. The sea blue color template instantaneously sets the tone of a deep sea diving experience.

The template is perfect for showcasing your aquarium's daily schedule, booking a virtual guided tour, and showcasing all the sea animals on your website. Additionally, an impressive gallery page helps visitors understand the species on display at the aquarium.

Key features of the Aquarium template

  • Awe-inspiring design tailor-made for an aquarium
  • The package includes templates for highlighting the animal species, among other things
  • Include a virtual guided tour helping visitors visualize the aquarium from the comfort of their doorstep
  • Allow visitors to book tickets online through your website
  • The template looks great on all mobile devices as well
id-51520.post-excerpt: Perfect template for showcasing aquatic plants and animals on an aquarium-based website

id-57346.title: Fashion Designer
id-57346.post-content:
Want to make a fashion website but don't know where to start? Our Fashion Designer template is the perfect place for you. Our template is the ideal home for your fashion designer business with a sleek and sophisticated design. 

Promote your clothing or accessories with our modern web design that includes client testimonials and photos from happy customers. Plus, we've included deals and offers to help you get your product noticed by potential customers.

Key features of the Fashion Designer template

  • Launch your fashion designer store using our classy website template
  • Sell accessories, tops, bottoms, dresses, and more on your online store
  • Showcase products based on the latest collections, new arrivals, best sellers, and more
  • Well integrated with WooCommerce allowing you to set up and sell immediately 
  • Customize and tweak every element of your store to suit your website needs
id-57346.post-excerpt: Classy and sophisticated design that’s perfect for anyone in the fashion industry

id-53589.title: Beer Launch Landing Page
id-53589.post-content:
The Beer Launch Landing Page template is a bright, happy template with a bright yellow header with a strong presence. It’s a modern design with unusual fonts that help the homepage stand out, ideal for new brewers or breweries.

The rest of the design includes relevant elements such as a timeline, product section, calls to action, a blog area and social media integrations. It’s a very effective design that encourages you to read more and engage further.

Key features of the Beer Launch Landing Page template

  • Colorful web template for brewers, breweries and drinks companies
  • Unusual header font helps it stand out
  • Bright colors and high quality images add to the appeal
  • Well-designed product section for drinks
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-53589.post-excerpt: Bright, happy web template ideal for brewers, breweries and artisan drinks companies

id-51427.title: Tech Startup
id-51427.post-content:
The Tech Startup template is a flat, modern design with bright colors, bold fonts and plenty of whitespace. It’s a great layout with fullscreen header setting out your stall and a simple navigation area with a bright download button.

The homepage is light, easygoing but also interesting. You’re encouraged to scroll down to learn more and presented with customizable content areas to outline your products or services and convert those visitors into customers. It’s a very well designed theme!

Key features of the Tech Startup template

  • Well-designed flat theme suitable for any type of business
  • Excellent choice of colors and fonts
  • Great layout with borderless sections
  • Customizable content areas throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-51427.post-excerpt: Well-designed flat theme with lovely colors, suitable for any type of business

id-49287.title: Food Truck
id-49287.post-content:
The Food Truck template is an awesome spectacle. It’s a fullscreen design with a lovely green color and a high quality image of a food truck front and center. With an attractive menu section, product highlight area and a timeline, it’s everything you need.

The design is superb, with modern fonts that stand out from the background color. The homepage includes relevant sections for a food business including a very attractive menu section, a scheduler for opening, map and a short biography to tell your story. It’s the only template you would ever need!

Key features of the Food Truck template

  • Colorful template that’s perfect for food trucks and food businesses
  • Fullscreen design that works on any screen size
  • Attractive menu areas really stand out
  • Customizable content sections throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-49287.post-excerpt: Colorful template with awesome design that’s ideal for food trucks and food businesses

id-49449.title: Vlogger
id-49449.post-content:
The Vlogger template uses a compelling portfolio layout that could be easily customized for any creative. It uses a full width header image with bold header and modern light fonts. It’s a very engaging start to what is an excellent design.

The homepage includes flexible content areas outlining the contents, biography, social media links, videos, timeline and a contact form. Some great colors, well-chosen fonts and subtle graphics elevates this template well above the norm.

Key features of the Vlogger template

  • Compelling portfolio template ideal for vloggers and creatives
  • Areas for biography, timeline and portfolio
  • Well-chosen fonts complement strong images
  • Customizable content areas throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-49449.post-excerpt: Fresh, compelling website template ideal for vloggers and any type of creative

id-51409.post-content:
